attributes.action: Give homeowners more power to protect their property when under threat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that the fact that homeowners cannot protect their property because of threat of prosecution by the criminal is absurd, and i think that the power should be given to homeowners or residents to use as much force as needed to protect their property and family.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
